#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<cmath>
#include<queue>
#include<cstdio>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>

#define MIN(a,b) (a<b?a:b)
#define MAX(a,b) (a>b?a:b)
#define ABS(a) (a>0?a:-a)

#define SZ(a) ((int)a.size())
#define PB(a) push_back(a)
#define ULL unsigned long long
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(int i=(a);i<=(b);i++)
#define REP(i,n) FOR(i,0,n-1)

using namespace std;

int main()
{
int t;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
    char str1[1000001];
    scanf(" %[^\n]",str1);
    string a = str1;

    ULL n = 0;
    vector <ULL> mult;

    ULL n5 = 0;
    ULL n2 = 0;

    bool flag = true;
    REP(i,SZ(a))
    {
        if (!(a[i]>='0' && a[i]<='9'))
        {
            if (n==0)
            {flag = false;
            break;
            }

            while(n%2==0)
            {
                n/=2;
                n2++;
            }

            while(n%5==0)
            {
                n/=5;
                n5++;
            }

            mult.PB(n);
            n = 0;
        }
        else
        {
            n *= 10;
            n += a[i] - '0';
        }
    }

    if (!flag || n==0)
     {
    printf("Robot hanged.\n");
         continue;
    }


            while(n%2==0)
            {
                n/=2;
                n2++;
            }

            while(n%5==0)
            {
                n/=5;
                n5++;
            }

            mult.PB(n);
            n = 0;

    ULL ans = 1;

    REP(i,SZ(mult))
    {
        ULL digit = mult[i]%10;
        ans *= digit;
        ans %= 10;
    }

    ULL s = MIN(n2,n5);
    n2 -= s;
    n5 -= s;

    FOR(i,1,n2)
    {
        ans *= 2;
        ans %= 10;
    }

    FOR(i,1,n5)
    {
        ans *= 5;
        ans %=10;
    }

    printf("%llu\n",ans%10);

}

return 0;
}
